mapper.insert: insert into tbl_group(g_code, g_name,g_pass,g_pic, g_regdate) values(seq_group.nextval, #{g_name},#{g_pass},#{g_pic}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from tbl_group INNER JOIN tbl_gu on tbl_group.g_code = tbl_gu.g_code where id = #{id}
select tbl_gu.id, tbl_user.name from tbl_gu inner join tbl_user on tbl_gu.id = tbl_user.id where g_code = #{g_code}
